Articles.Content: Hey Gang, Been playing KSP since 0.19 and love the 'sandbox' as it is so far, I can not wait to see it grow into a full on game. I love building rockets, stations and bases in KSP and since i keep running into situation where I wish i had this part or that part, i have decided to join the fray and develop some parts for KSP. I have some ideas for a mod which I will be posting information and my pre-visualization in the add-on development forums. I am a software engineer by day and a 3-D animator at night, so hopefully I can create a mod most people will enjoy. Hats off to all those mod developers that have created some really cool content so far!
